name: Planet Drifter
description:
Reach the vortex before your fuel runs out!

Up arrow key to use your thruster.
Left and Right arrow keys to rotate your ship.
Escape to return to menu.
R to restart a level.

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 39. The theme was Running out of power.

Olivier Grech - Louis Fest - Carlos Filipe Moreira Guedes
